name: CosmoSmash
description:
Traveling back from a research expedition your team gets trapped in an alien attack.

Put on your space suit and grab your Power Hammer™ you and yor buddy must defend the ship at all cost, are you a bad enough cosmonaut?.

Instructions:

Both players share the screen, touch the bottom and drag to move the player, hit the falling objects with your Power Hammer™, 3 hits to the ship and is game over.
